org.swixml
Class XGridBagConstraints

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.GridBagConstraints
      org.swixml.XGridBagConstraints
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, Cloneable
public class XGridBagConstraints
extends GridBagConstraints

XGridBagConstraints simple extends GridBagConstraints to make bean style getters and setters available for all public fields in the GridBagConstraints class.

Version:
$Revision: 1.1 $
Author:
Wolf Paulus
See Also:
Serialized Form
